Package: com.android.build.gradle.api

[Java] Interface AndroidSourceDirectorySet

  • An AndroidSourceDirectorySet represents a lit of directory input for an Android project.

    • Methods Summary

        Methods 
        Type Name and description
        org.gradle.api.tasks.util.PatternFilterable getFilter()
        Returns the filter used to select the source from the source directories.
        String getName()
        A concise name for the source directory (typically used to identify it in a collection).
        org.gradle.api.file.FileTree getSourceFiles()
        Returns the list of source files as a org.gradle.api.file.FileTree
        Set<File> getSrcDirs()
        Returns the resolved directories.
        AndroidSourceDirectorySet setSrcDirs(Iterable<?> srcDirs)
        Sets the source directories for this set.
        AndroidSourceDirectorySet srcDir(Object srcDir)
        Adds the given source directory to this set.
        AndroidSourceDirectorySet srcDirs(Object... srcDirs)
        Adds the given source directories to this set.

      • @com.android.annotations.NonNull public org.gradle.api.tasks.util.PatternFilterable getFilter()

        Returns the filter used to select the source from the source directories.

        Returns:
        a non null org.gradle.api.tasks.util.PatternFilterable

      • @com.android.annotations.NonNull public String getName()

        A concise name for the source directory (typically used to identify it in a collection).

      • @com.android.annotations.NonNull public org.gradle.api.file.FileTree getSourceFiles()

        Returns the list of source files as a org.gradle.api.file.FileTree

        Returns:
        a non null org.gradle.api.file.FileTree for all the source files in this set.

      • @com.android.annotations.NonNull public Set<File> getSrcDirs()

        Returns the resolved directories.

        Setter can be called with a collection of Objects, just like Gradle's project.file(...).

        Returns:
        a non null set of File objects.

      • @com.android.annotations.NonNull public AndroidSourceDirectorySet setSrcDirs(Iterable<?> srcDirs)

        Sets the source directories for this set.

        Parameters:
        srcDirs - The source directories. These are evaluated as for org.gradle.api.Project#files(Object...)
        Returns:
        this

      • @com.android.annotations.NonNull public AndroidSourceDirectorySet srcDir(Object srcDir)

        Adds the given source directory to this set.

        Parameters:
        srcDir - The source directory. This is evaluated as for org.gradle.api.Project#file(Object)
        Returns:
        this

      • @com.android.annotations.NonNull public AndroidSourceDirectorySet srcDirs(Object... srcDirs)

        Adds the given source directories to this set.

        Parameters:
        srcDirs - The source directories. These are evaluated as for org.gradle.api.Project#files(Object...)
        Returns:
        this
